TITLE: Using MapComponent in an Angular component
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to use the `MapComponent` within an Angular component. It imports the necessary modules, defines a template with the `mgl-map` component, and sets its properties such as style, zoom, and center. It also shows how to define the style for the map container.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import { MapComponent } from '@maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl';

@NgModule({
  template: `
    <mgl-map
      [style]="'https://demotiles.maplibre.org/style.json'"
      [zoom]="[9]"
      [center]="[-74.5, 40]"
    >
    </mgl-map>
  `,
  styles: [
    `
      mgl-map {
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
      }
    `,
  ],
  imports: [MapComponent],
})
export class AppComponent {}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing ngx-maplibre-gl and maplibre-gl
DESCRIPTION: These commands install the ngx-maplibre-gl library and its dependency, maplibre-gl, using either npm or yarn.  This step is necessary before using the library in an Angular project. The libraries are installed as node modules.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
npm install @maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl maplibre-gl
yarn add @maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl maplibre-gl
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding maplibre-gl CSS in angular.json
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import the `maplibre-gl.css` file in `angular.json`.  This makes the maplibre-gl styles available to the Angular application by including the CSS file in the styles array within the angular.json file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"styles": [
  ...,
  "./node_modules/maplibre-gl/dist/maplibre-gl.css"
],
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring tsconfig.json
DESCRIPTION: This configuration snippet shows required changes to the `tsconfig.json` file. Specifically, it sets `strictNullChecks` to `false` and `skipLibCheck` to `true`.  These settings are often needed to avoid type checking errors when using `ngx-maplibre-gl`.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"compilerOptions": {
    ...
    "strictNullChecks": false,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing maplibre-gl CSS in styles.css
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import the `maplibre-gl.css` file in a global CSS file (e.g., `styles.css`). This alternative approach allows including the styles by directly importing the CSS file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
@import '~maplibre-gl/dist/maplibre-gl.css';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Install Project Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the project dependencies as defined in the package.json file. It ensures that the correct versions of all required packages are installed for the project to function correctly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm ci
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Run ngx-maplibre-gl Showcase
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the ngx-maplibre-gl showcase application. It allows developers to test changes to the library directly within the showcase environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Start Showcase After Upgrade
DESCRIPTION: This command is used to start the showcase application after upgrading maplibre-gl or Angular. It allows for testing the map's functionality with the updated dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generate API Documentation
DESCRIPTION: This command generates the API documentation for ngx-maplibre-gl using TypeDoc. The generated documentation is placed in the API folder under dist/showcase and is served using an iframe.
SOURCE: https://github.com/maplibre/ngx-maplibre-gl/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run docs
```
